revised_title: Geological Analysis of Rocks and Minerals from the Karakoram Himalayas
tldr: The authors examine over 300 rock and mineral specimens collected by Mr. W.M. Conway in the Karakoram Himalayas. They provide a detailed analysis of the crystalline rocks, igneous rocks, schists, and sedimentary rocks found in the region, discussing their composition, structure, and potential geological significance.
